title: # 447 - Adam Ray & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Adam Ray. We talk about his road trip to Seattle, partying with Adam DeVine, The Rock, Toms Injury, Snoop Dogg, Brad Williams, and much more! 

 

Check out my new show “Go Big Show” Thursdays at 9pm PST on TBS! 

Adam Ray's virtual show "Adam Ray & Friends" will be live Feb 5th at 7PM PST. Get your tickets at http://www.rushtix.com 

This episode is brought to you by Fre. Get 20% off at http://www.frepouch.com when you use the promo code “FreBert”.

 

This episode is brought to you by Intuit TurboTax Live. File with the help of an expert or let an expert file for you at http://www.turbotax.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mercari. Start buying and selling when you download today from the App Stores or at http://www.Mercari.com 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Ketum Superior Kratom. Check out Ketum at http://www.shopketum.com and use promo code BIGBERT for 20% off ALL Ketum products.

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
